item.title: Xp gained wont change?!?
item.dc:creator: @master257 master257
item.description:
@master257 wrote:

Yea I Cant Change The Amount Of Experienced Gained -.- I Want It Only Two Times The Normal Amount Gained And I Tryed Doing This :

				if(!UseBow){
					if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff < 0)) {
						hitDiff2 = EnemyHP;
						GotKill = true;
						ResetAttack();
					} else
            				hitDiff2 = hitDiff;
				} 
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = hitDiff2;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				p.KillerId = playerId;
				if(!UseBow){
				double TotalExp = 0;
				if (FightType != 3) {
					TotalExp = (double)(2 * hitDiff2);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
				} else {
					TotalExp = (double)(2 * hitDiff2);
					TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
					addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
				}
				TotalExp = (double)(2 * hitDiff2);
				TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
				addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
				}
				actionTimer = 4;
			}
		}
	}

And it Didnt Work It Still Gives The Same XP As Before … Any Help ?

Read full topic
